results.name: Compound filter (summands of A004001 & summands of A005185): a(n) = P(A286541(n), A286559(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function, with a(1) = a(2) = 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
